.. raw:: html

      <style type="text/css">
        td { text-align: left; }
        .notstarted { opacity: 60%; }
        .nothingtodo {
            background-color: #99FF99;
            font-style: italic;
         }
        .inprogress {
            background-color: #FFFF99;
            font-style: italic;
         }
        .inreview { background-color: #FFFF99; }
        .partial {
            background-color: #2CCCFF;
            font-style: italic;
         }
        .complete { background-color: #99FF99; }
      </style>
